VariableDescription.Name: tha_pos
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******

#
#     PROJECT                         THEMIS
#     SOURCE_NAME                     THA>THEMIS Probe A
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#                                     Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies

#     TEXT                            Produced by Mission Ops, Science Ops and Science Team..V00: Predictive on all,                         
#     TEXT                             pre-pass.V01: Intermediate: added definitive spinper, spinphase others predictive,                    
#     TEXT                             expected shortly after pass.V02: Preliminary: added definitive position, expected                     
#     TEXT                             shortly after OD update (1 day after pass).V03: Definitive: added science attitude                    
#                                      determination using perigee data post-processing                                                      
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ephemeris
#                                     Engineering
#     MISSION_GROUP                   THEMIS
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  tha_l1_state
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 tha_l1_state_00000000_v00
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Probe state file, contains position, attitude, sun pulse data
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 1min, typical (3s occasional)
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Open Data for Scientific Use
#     GENERATED_BY                    THEMIS SOC
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2008-04-09
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 NASA Contract NAS5-02099

#     FILE_NAMING_CONVENTION          source_descriptor_datatype
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/THEMIS/A/Ephemeris/PT01M
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. tha_state_epoch
#  2. tha_state_time, UTC, in seconds since 01-Jan-1970 00:00:00
#       NOTES:  Unleaped seconds
#  3. tha_position XYZ in GEI (timeseries plot)
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 20:03:59 2015
